author: Little_Suzy_M
title: Near Vatican City ; Clean hotel; safe
text:
The hotel is very near Vatican City, helpful staff, clean rooms, free wifi, with a good window view. They provide a map with attractions that is very helpful. Location wise, it is one straight bus to the airport (10min walking distance to the bus stop for the Airport shuttle service €6;2 blocks away) You can also take a straight bus to Roma Termini if you need to take a regional train (15-20mins bus ride Bus number : 40 )
There is a restaurant just outside the hotel to your right and a small grocery store for your bottled water and €1 souvenirs like ref magnets, key chains. To your left is a bank atm machine, and further down is another small grocery, and a short walk to the Vatican City passing through several souvenir shops and restaurants. Nearby pharmacy 1 block away.
